resources.string: *Your BAC percentage is based on calculation and might be off

My Drinking Buddy, LLC is hereafter known as The Company. The Company is not to be held liable for any damages, injuries, or death caused by usage of the app. The Compnay does not guaruntee that the app will produce accurate health information and is not endorsed by a medical professional.
